text: The breath is not something you do. It is something you allow.
Sitting quietly, doing nothing, spring comes, and the grass grows by itself.
To study the self is to forget the self. To forget the self is to be awakened by all things.
source: The Gateless Gate: A Modern Reading

text: Every step is arrival. There is nowhere else to be.
Silence is not the absence of sound. It is the presence of attention.
The mountain does not move, and yet it is never still.
When you wash the dishes, wash the dishes. That is the whole teaching.
The space between thoughts is where the practice begins.
